attributes.comment:
As one of many families currently in the process of adopting an orphan from
China, I ask you to please reconsider your plan to increase the cost of fingerprints
and the I-600 form. Given the extended adoption timeframe we are experiencing
with the Chinese government, most of us will have to apply for a second set of
fingerprints and submit a second I-600 before we're able to travel to China to
complete our adoption as our originals will expire. International adoption is an
expensive endeavor; please don't add more expense than we already have in this
process.

I greatly appreciate the time you took to read this note - and hope you'll take a few
more minutes to think about the financial implications this will have for so many
families who are trying to do a good thing.

Sincerely,
Diane and Martin Janowak
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Diane S. Janowak
